verses.kjv: Jude, the servant of Jesus Christ, and brother of James, to them that are sanctified by God the Father, and preserved in Jesus Christ, and called:
verses.ct: From Jude, a servant of Jesus Christ and a brother of James. To those who are loved by God the Father, kept safe in Jesus Christ, and called to him:

verses.kjv: Mercy unto you, and peace, and love, be multiplied.
verses.ct: May mercy, peace, and love be given to you in abundance.

verses.kjv: Beloved, when I gave all diligence to write unto you of the common salvation, it was needful for me to write unto you, and exhort you that ye should earnestly contend for the faith which was once delivered unto the saints.
verses.ct: Dear friends, I was eager to write to you about the salvation we all share, but I felt compelled instead to urge you to fight hard for the faith that was handed down to God's people once and for all.

verses.kjv: For there are certain men crept in unawares, who were before of old ordained to this condemnation, ungodly men, turning the grace of our God into lasciviousness, and denying the only Lord God, and our Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.ct: Certain people have quietly slipped in among you — people who were marked out long ago for this judgment. They are ungodly individuals who twist the grace of our God into an excuse for immoral living and who reject the only Lord God and our Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: I will therefore put you in remembrance, though ye once knew this, how that the Lord, having saved the people out of the land of Egypt, afterward destroyed them that believed not.
verses.ct: I want to remind you, even though you already know all this, that the Lord rescued his people from the land of Egypt but later destroyed those among them who refused to believe.

verses.kjv: And the angels which kept not their first estate, but left their own habitation, he hath reserved in everlasting chains under darkness unto the judgment of the great day.
verses.ct: The angels who abandoned their rightful positions and left their proper dwelling — God has kept them locked in eternal chains in deep darkness, waiting for the judgment of the great day.

verses.kjv: Even as Sodom and Gomorrha, and the cities about them in like manner, giving themselves over to fornication, and going after strange flesh, are set forth for an example, suffering the vengeance of eternal fire.
verses.ct: In the same way, Sodom and Gomorrha and the surrounding cities gave themselves over to sexual immorality and pursued unnatural desires. They serve as a warning, suffering the punishment of eternal fire.

verses.kjv: Likewise also these filthy dreamers defile the flesh, despise dominion, and speak evil of dignities.
verses.ct: In the same way, these people pollute their own bodies through their depraved fantasies, reject authority, and slander heavenly beings.

verses.kjv: Yet Michael the archangel, when contending with the devil he disputed about the body of Moses, durst not bring against him a railing accusation, but said, The Lord rebuke thee.
verses.ct: But even Michael the archangel, when he was arguing with the devil in a dispute over the body of Moses, did not dare to bring a slanderous accusation against him. Instead, he simply said, 'The Lord rebuke you.'

verses.kjv: But these speak evil of those things which they know not: but what they know naturally, as brute beasts, in those things they corrupt themselves.
verses.ct: These people, however, insult whatever they don't understand. And the things they do grasp by instinct — like unreasoning animals — those are the very things that destroy them.

verses.kjv: Woe unto them! for they have gone in the way of Cain, and ran greedily after the error of Balaam for reward, and perished in the gainsaying of Core.
verses.ct: How terrible for them! They have followed the path of Cain, rushed headlong into Balaam's error for the sake of profit, and been destroyed in rebellion like Korah.

verses.kjv: These are spots in your feasts of charity, when they feast with you, feeding themselves without fear: clouds they are without water, carried about of winds; trees whose fruit withereth, without fruit, twice dead, plucked up by the roots;
verses.ct: These people are dangerous stains at your love feasts, eating alongside you without any shame, caring only about themselves. They are clouds blown around by the wind but carrying no rain. They are trees in autumn with no fruit — doubly dead and ripped out by the roots.

verses.kjv: Raging waves of the sea, foaming out their own shame; wandering stars, to whom is reserved the blackness of darkness for ever.
verses.ct: They are wild ocean waves churning up the foam of their own disgrace. They are wandering stars for whom the deepest darkness has been reserved forever.

verses.kjv: And Enoch also, the seventh from Adam, prophesied of these, saying, Behold, the Lord cometh with ten thousands of his saints,
verses.ct: Enoch, the 7th generation from Adam, prophesied about these people when he said, 'Look — the Lord is coming with tens of thousands of his holy ones

verses.kjv: To execute judgment upon all, and to convince all that are ungodly among them of all their ungodly deeds which they have ungodly committed, and of all their hard speeches which ungodly sinners have spoken against him.
verses.ct: to carry out judgment on everyone, and to convict every ungodly person of all the ungodly things they have done in their ungodly way, and of all the harsh things that ungodly sinners have said against him.'

verses.kjv: These are murmurers, complainers, walking after their own lusts; and their mouth speaketh great swelling words, having men’s persons in admiration because of advantage.
verses.ct: These people are constant grumblers and complainers, driven by their own desires. They talk arrogantly and flatter others only to get what they want.

verses.kjv: But, beloved, remember ye the words which were spoken before of the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ;
verses.ct: But you, dear friends, remember what the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ told you ahead of time.

verses.kjv: How that they told you there should be mockers in the last time, who should walk after their own ungodly lusts.
verses.ct: They warned you, 'In the final days, there will be scoffers who chase after their own ungodly desires.'

verses.kjv: These be they who separate themselves, sensual, having not the Spirit.
verses.ct: These are the ones who cause divisions. They are controlled by their natural impulses and do not have the Spirit.

verses.kjv: But ye, beloved, building up yourselves on your most holy faith, praying in the Holy Ghost,
verses.ct: But you, dear friends, must strengthen yourselves by building on your most holy faith and praying through the Holy Spirit.

verses.kjv: Keep yourselves in the love of God, looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ unto eternal life.
verses.ct: Stay rooted in God's love as you wait for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ that leads to eternal life.

verses.kjv: And of some have compassion, making a difference:
verses.ct: Show compassion to those who are wavering.

verses.kjv: And others save with fear, pulling them out of the fire; hating even the garment spotted by the flesh.
verses.ct: Rescue others by snatching them out of the fire. To still others, show mercy mixed with caution, despising even clothing contaminated by sinful corruption.

verses.kjv: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy,
verses.ct: Now to the one who is able to protect you from stumbling and to bring you into the presence of his glory without fault and with overwhelming joy —

verses.kjv: To the only wise God our Saviour, be glory and majesty, dominion and power, both now and ever. Amen.
verses.ct: to the only God our Savior, through our Lord Jesus Christ, be glory, majesty, power, and authority, before all time, now, and forevermore. Amen.
